memberdef.name: dirs
memberdef.initializer: = { "scraped": self.work_dir / "01_scraped", "parsed": self.work_dir / "02_parsed", "uml": self.work_dir / "03_uml", "tei": self.work_dir / "04_tei", "transformed": self.work_dir / "05_transformed", "validation": self.work_dir / "06_validation", "reports": self.work_dir / "reports", }

para.verbatim: Process complete website through the pipeline
Stage 2: Parse MarkdownTeX content to AST
Stage 3: Generate UML diagrams from site structure
Stage 4: Generate canonical TEI XML format
Stage 5: Transform TEI to multiple output formats
Stage 6: Validate pipeline and test isomorphism
Get XPath count from XML file
Get directory structure and file counts
Generate recommendations based on pipeline results
